@app_sign_out.description: Text on menu option to log out of the application

@app_theme.description: Text on menu button for displaying themes

@app_theme_light.description: Text on menu option to switch to light theme

@app_theme_dark.description: Text on menu option to switch to dark theme

@app_theme_os.description: Text on menu option to use light theme or dark theme based on the client’s OS settings
